content.content: Here are several ways to get the latest version of the mod. Below, we've listed three of the most convenient.

Launched only a few weeks ago, it offers not only the newest COHP mod but also a growing library of maps created by both our dev team and the community. Drop by, grab the files, and stay for the conversation.
Click Me To Join Our Discord Server!
Just click the link underneath and hit “Subscribe” in the Steam Workshop. From then on every patch will download automatically; you never have to hunt for updates again.
Click Me To Subscribe In Steam Workshop!
QQ Group: for players in China
QQ is China's most popular instant-messenger. If you want to team up with Chinese players, click the link below and join the group.
Click Me To Join Our QQ Group!
